name: Box Battle [Beta]
description:
This is a game where you play as a blue box, and try to survive as long as possible!

How to play:

Left Arrow Key = Move Left

Right Arrow Key = Move Right

Spacebar = Jump

Move left, right and jump to avoid other blocks and make them crash into the walls. Also, collect powerups to make the game easier as you go along. The powerups are:

Red Sphere = +1 Max Health

Green Sphere = Health set to Max

Orange Sphere = 5 Second Invincibility (10 for the first time you get the powerup)

Blue Sphere = +0.001 Speed, but if the Number of Enemies on the Field is over 3, you can kill one Enemy forever

Have Fun!
